013package org.apache.juneau.dto.jsonschema;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
018
019import java.net.*;
020import java.util.*;
021
022import org.apache.juneau.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.json.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.parser.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
028
029/**
030 * Represents a top-level schema object bean in the JSON-Schema core specification.
031 *
032 * <ul class='seealso'>
033 *    <li class='jp'><a class="doclink" href="package-summary.html#TOC">org.apache.juneau.dto.jsonschema</a>
034
035 * </ul>
036 */
037@Bean(typeName="schema",
038   properties="id,$schema,$ref, title,description,type,definitions,properties,"
039      + "patternProperties,dependencies,items,multipleOf,maximum,exclusiveMaximum,"
040      + "minimum,exclusiveMinimum,maxLength,minLength,pattern,additionalItems,"
041      + "maxItems,minItems,uniqueItems,maxProperties,minProperties,required,"
042      + "additionalProperties,enum,allOf,anyOf,oneOf,not"
043)
044public class JsonSchema {
045   private String name;                                   // Property name.  Not serialized.
046   private URI id;
047   private URI schemaVersion;
048   private String title;
049   private String description;
050   private JsonType typeJsonType;                         // JsonType representation of type
051   private JsonTypeArray typeJsonTypeArray;               // JsonTypeArray representation of type
052   private Map<String,JsonSchema> definitions;
053   private Map<String,JsonSchema> properties;
054   private Map<String,JsonSchema> patternProperties;
055   private Map<String,JsonSchema> dependencies;
056   private JsonSchema itemsSchema;                            // JsonSchema representation of items
057   private JsonSchemaArray itemsSchemaArray;                  // JsonSchemaArray representation of items
058   private Number multipleOf;
059   private Number maximum;
060   private Boolean exclusiveMaximum;
061   private Number minimum;
062   private Boolean exclusiveMinimum;
063   private Integer maxLength;
064   private Integer minLength;
065   private String pattern;
066   private Boolean additionalItemsBoolean;                // Boolean representation of additionalItems
067   private JsonSchemaArray additionalItemsSchemaArray;        // JsonSchemaArray representation of additionalItems
068   private Integer maxItems;
069   private Integer minItems;
070   private Boolean uniqueItems;
071   private Integer maxProperties;
072   private Integer minProperties;
073   private List<String> required;
074   private Boolean additionalPropertiesBoolean;           // Boolean representation of additionalProperties
075   private JsonSchema additionalPropertiesSchema;             // JsonSchema representation of additionalProperties
076   private List<String> _enum;
077   private List<JsonSchema> allOf;
078   private List<JsonSchema> anyOf;
079   private List<JsonSchema> oneOf;
080   private JsonSchema not;
081   private URI ref;
082   private JsonSchemaMap schemaMap;
083   private JsonSchema master = this;
084
085   /**
086    * Default constructor.
087    */
088   public JsonSchema() {}
089
090
091   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
092   // Bean properties
093   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
094
095   /**
096    * Bean property getter:  <property>name</property>.
097    *
098    * @return The value of the <property>name</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
099    */
100   public String getName() {
101      return name;
102   }
103
104   /**
105    * Bean property setter:  <property>name</property>.
106    *
107    * @param name The new value for the <property>name</property> property on this bean.
108    * @return This object.
109    */
110   public JsonSchema setName(String name) {
111      this.name = name;
112      return this;
113   }
114
115   /**
116    * Bean property getter:  <property>id</property>.
117    *
118    * @return The value of the <property>id</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
119    */
120   public URI getId() {
121      return id;
122   }
123
124   /**
125    * Bean property setter:  <property>id</property>.
126    *
127    * <p>
128    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
129    * Strings must be valid URIs.
130    *
131    * <p>
132    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
133    *
134    * @param id The new value for the <property>id</property> property on this bean.
135    * @return This object.
136    */
137   public JsonSchema setId(Object id) {
138      this.id = toURI(id);
139      return this;
140   }
141
142   /**
143    * Bean property getter:  <property>$schema</property>.
144    *
145    * @return The value of the <property>$schema</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
146    */
147   @Beanp("$schema")
148   public URI getSchemaVersionUri() {
149      return schemaVersion;
150   }
151
152   /**
153    * Bean property setter:  <property>$schema</property>.
154    *
155    * <p>
156    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
157    * Strings must be valid URIs.
158    *
159    * <p>
160    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
161    *
162    * @param schemaVersion The new value for the <property>schemaVersion</property> property on this bean.
163    * @return This object.
164    */
165   @Beanp("$schema")
166   public JsonSchema setSchemaVersionUri(Object schemaVersion) {
167      this.schemaVersion = toURI(schemaVersion);
168      return this;
169   }
170
171   /**
172    * Bean property getter:  <property>title</property>.
173    *
174    * @return The value of the <property>title</property> property, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
175    */
176   public String getTitle() {
177      return title;
178   }
179
180   /**
181    * Bean property setter:  <property>title</property>.
182    *
183    * @param title The new value for the <property>title</property> property on this bean.
184    * @return This object.
185    */
186   public JsonSchema setTitle(String title) {
187      this.title = title;
188      return this;
189   }
190
191   /**
192    * Bean property getter:  <property>description</property>.
193    *
194    * @return The value of the <property>description</property> property, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
195    */
196   public String getDescription() {
197      return description;
198   }
199
200   /**
201    * Bean property setter:  <property>description</property>.
202    *
203    * @param description The new value for the <property>description</property> property on this bean.
204    * @return This object.
205    */
206   public JsonSchema setDescription(String description) {
207      this.description = description;
208      return this;
209   }
210
211   /**
212    * Bean property getter:  <property>type</property>.
213    *
214    * @return
215    *    The value of the <property>type</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
216    *    Can be either a {@link JsonType} or {@link JsonTypeArray} depending on what value was used to set it.
217    */
218   @Swap(JsonTypeOrJsonTypeArraySwap.class)
219   public Object getType() {
220      if (typeJsonType != null)
221         return typeJsonType;
222      return typeJsonTypeArray;
223   }
224
225   /**
226    * Bean property getter:  <property>type</property>.
227    *
228    * <p>
229    * Convenience method for returning the <property>type</property> property when it is a {@link JsonType} value.
230    *
231    * @return
232    *    The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonTypeArray}.
233    */
234   public JsonType getTypeAsJsonType() {
235      return typeJsonType;
236   }
237
238   /**
239    * Bean property getter:  <property>type</property>.
240    *
241    * <p>
242    * Convenience method for returning the <property>type</property> property when it is a {@link JsonTypeArray} value.
243    *
244    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonType}.
245    */
246   public JsonTypeArray getTypeAsJsonTypeArray() {
247      return typeJsonTypeArray;
248   }
249
250   /**
251    * Bean property setter:  <property>type</property>.
252    *
253    * @param type
254    *    The new value for the <property>type</property> property on this bean.
255    *    This object must be of type {@link JsonType} or {@link JsonTypeArray}.
256    * @return This object.
257    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
258    */
259   public JsonSchema setType(Object type) {
260      this.typeJsonType = null;
261      this.typeJsonTypeArray = null;
262      if (type != null) {
263         if (type instanceof JsonType)
264            this.typeJsonType = (JsonType)type;
265         else if (type instanceof JsonTypeArray)
266            this.typeJsonTypeArray = (JsonTypeArray)type;
267         else
268            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class, "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  SimpleType, SimpleTypeArray", className(type));
269      }
270      return this;
271   }
272
273   /**
274    * Bean property appender:  <property>type</property>.
275    *
276    * @param types The list of items to append to the <property>type</property> property on this bean.
277    * @return This object.
278    */
279   public JsonSchema addTypes(JsonType...types) {
280      if (this.typeJsonTypeArray == null)
281         this.typeJsonTypeArray = new JsonTypeArray();
282      this.typeJsonTypeArray.addAll(types);
283      return this;
284   }
285
286   /**
287    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>type</property> property to the correct class type.
288    *
289    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
290    *    <li>
291    *       If parsing a JSON-array, converts to a {@link JsonTypeArray}.
292    *    <li>
293    *       If parsing a JSON-object, converts to a {@link JsonType}.
294    * </ul>
295    *
296    * <p>
297    * Serialization method is a no-op.
298    */
299   public static class JsonTypeOrJsonTypeArraySwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
300
301      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
302      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
303         return o;
304      }
305
306      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
307      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
308         ClassMeta<?> cm = (
309            o instanceof Collection
310            ? session.getClassMeta(JsonTypeArray.class)
311            : session.getClassMeta(JsonType.class)
312         );
313         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
314      }
315   }
316
317   /**
318    * Bean property getter:  <property>definitions</property>.
319    *
320    * @return
321    *    The value of the <property>definitions</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
322    */
323   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getDefinitions() {
324      return definitions;
325   }
326
327   /**
328    * Bean property setter:  <property>definitions</property>.
329    *
330    * @param definitions The new value for the <property>definitions</property> property on this bean.
331    * @return This object.
332    */
333   public JsonSchema setDefinitions(Map<String,JsonSchema> definitions) {
334      this.definitions = definitions;
335      if (definitions != null)
336         setMasterOn(definitions.values());
337      return this;
338   }
339
340   /**
341    * Bean property appender:  <property>definitions</property>.
342    *
343    * @param name The key in the definitions map entry.
344    * @param definition The value in the definitions map entry.
345    * @return This object.
346    */
347   public JsonSchema addDefinition(String name, JsonSchema definition) {
348      if (this.definitions == null)
349         this.definitions = map();
350      this.definitions.put(name, definition);
351      setMasterOn(definition);
352      return this;
353   }
354
355   /**
356    * Bean property getter:  <property>properties</property>.
357    *
358    * @return The value of the <property>properties</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
359    */
360   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getProperties() {
361      return properties;
362   }
363
364   /**
365    * Returns the property with the specified name.
366    *
367    * <p>
368    * This is equivalent to calling <property>getProperty(name, <jk>false</jk>)</property>.
369    *
370    * @param name The property name.
371    * @return The property with the specified name, or <jk>null</jk> if no property is specified.
372    */
373   public JsonSchema getProperty(String name) {
374      return getProperty(name, false);
375   }
376
377   /**
378    * Returns the property with the specified name.
379    *
380    * <p>
381    * If <property>resolve</property> is <jk>true</jk>, the property object will automatically be  resolved by calling
382    * {@link #resolve()}.
383    * Therefore, <property>getProperty(name, <jk>true</jk>)</property> is equivalent to calling
384    * <property>getProperty(name).resolve()</property>, except it's safe from a potential
385    * <property>NullPointerException</property>.
386    *
387    * @param name The property name.
388    * @param resolve If <jk>true</jk>, calls {@link #resolve()} on object before returning.
389    * @return The property with the specified name, or <jk>null</jk> if no property is specified.
390    */
391   public JsonSchema getProperty(String name, boolean resolve) {
392      if (properties == null)
393         return null;
394      JsonSchema s = properties.get(name);
395      if (s == null)
396         return null;
397      if (resolve)
398         s = s.resolve();
399      return s;
400   }
401
402   /**
403    * Bean property setter:  <property>properties</property>.
404    *
405    * @param properties The new value for the <property>properties</property> property on this bean.
406    * @return This object.
407    */
408   public JsonSchema setProperties(Map<String,JsonSchema> properties) {
409      this.properties = properties;
410      if (properties != null) {
411         properties.entrySet().forEach(x -> {
412            JsonSchema value = x.getValue();
413            setMasterOn(value);
414            value.setName(x.getKey());
415         });
416      }
417      return this;
418   }
419
420   /**
421    * Bean property appender:  <property>properties</property>.
422    *
423    * <p>
424    * Properties must have their <property>name</property> property set on them when using this method.
425    *
426    * @param properties The list of items to append to the <property>properties</property> property on this bean.
427    * @return This object.
428    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If property is found without a set <property>name</property> property.
429    */
430   public JsonSchema addProperties(JsonSchema...properties) {
431      if (this.properties == null)
432         this.properties = map();
433      for (JsonSchema p : properties) {
434         if (p.getName() == null)
435            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchema.class,
436               "Invalid property passed to JsonSchema.addProperties().  Property name was null.");
437         setMasterOn(p);
438         this.properties.put(p.getName(), p);
439      }
440      return this;
441   }
442
443   /**
444    * Bean property getter:  <property>patternProperties</property>.
445    *
446    * @return
447    *    The value of the <property>patternProperties</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is
448    *    not set.
449    */
450   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getPatternProperties() {
451      return patternProperties;
452   }
453
454   /**
455    * Bean property setter:  <property>patternProperties</property>.
456    *
457    * @param patternProperties The new value for the <property>patternProperties</property> property on this bean.
458    * @return This object.
459    */
460   public JsonSchema setPatternProperties(Map<String,JsonSchema> patternProperties) {
461      this.patternProperties = patternProperties;
462      if (patternProperties != null) {
463         patternProperties.entrySet().forEach(x -> {
464            JsonSchema s = x.getValue();
465            setMasterOn(s);
466            s.setName(x.getKey());
467         });
468      }
469      return this;
470   }
471
472   /**
473    * Bean property appender:  <property>patternProperties</property>.
474    *
475    * <p>
476    * Properties must have their <property>name</property> property set to the pattern string when using this method.
477    *
478    * @param properties The list of items to append to the <property>patternProperties</property> property on this bean.
479    * @return This object.
480    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If property is found without a set <property>name</property> property.
481    */
482   public JsonSchema addPatternProperties(JsonSchemaProperty...properties) {
483      if (this.patternProperties == null)
484         this.patternProperties = map();
485      for (JsonSchema p : properties) {
486         if (p.getName() == null)
487            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchema.class,
488               "Invalid property passed to JsonSchema.addProperties().  Property name was null.");
489         setMasterOn(p);
490         this.patternProperties.put(p.getName(), p);
491      }
492      return this;
493   }
494
495   /**
496    * Bean property getter:  <property>dependencies</property>.
497    *
498    * @return
499    *    The value of the <property>dependencies</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
500    */
501   public Map<String,JsonSchema> getDependencies() {
502      return dependencies;
503   }
504
505   /**
506    * Bean property setter:  <property>dependencies</property>.
507    *
508    * @param dependencies The new value for the <property>dependencies</property> property on this bean.
509    * @return This object.
510    */
511   public JsonSchema setDependencies(Map<String,JsonSchema> dependencies) {
512      this.dependencies = dependencies;
513      if (dependencies != null)
514         setMasterOn(dependencies.values());
515      return this;
516   }
517
518   /**
519    * Bean property appender:  <property>dependencies</property>.
520    *
521    * @param name The key of the entry in the dependencies map.
522    * @param dependency The value of the entry in the dependencies map.
523    * @return This object.
524    */
525   public JsonSchema addDependency(String name, JsonSchema dependency) {
526      if (this.dependencies == null)
527         this.dependencies = map();
528      this.dependencies.put(name, dependency);
529      setMasterOn(dependency);
530      return this;
531   }

533   /**
534    * Bean property getter:  <property>items</property>.
535    *
536    * @return
537    *    The value of the <property>items</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
538    *    Can be either a {@link JsonSchema} or {@link JsonSchemaArray} depending on what value was used to set it.
539    */
540   @Swap(JsonSchemaOrSchemaArraySwap.class)
541   public Object getItems() {
542      if (itemsSchema != null)
543         return itemsSchema;
544      return itemsSchemaArray;
545   }
546
547   /**
548    * Bean property getter:  <property>items</property>.
549    *
550    * <p>
551    * Convenience method for returning the <property>items</property> property when it is a {@link JsonSchema} value.
552    *
553    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
554    */
555   public JsonSchema getItemsAsSchema() {
556      return itemsSchema;
557   }
558
559   /**
560    * Bean property getter:  <property>items</property>.
561    *
562    * <p>
563    * Convenience method for returning the <property>items</property> property when it is a {@link JsonSchemaArray} value.
564    *
565    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonSchema}.
566    */
567   public JsonSchemaArray getItemsAsSchemaArray() {
568      return itemsSchemaArray;
569   }
570
571   /**
572    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>items</property> property to the correct class type.
573    *
574    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
575    *    <li>
576    *       If parsing a JSON-array, converts to a {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
577    *    <li>
578    *       If parsing a JSON-object, converts to a {@link JsonSchema}.
579    * </ul>
580    *
581    * <p>
582    * Serialization method is a no-op.
583    */
584   public static class JsonSchemaOrSchemaArraySwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
585
586      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
587      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
588         return o;
589      }
590
591      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
592      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
593         ClassMeta<?> cm = (
594            o instanceof Collection
595            ? session.getClassMeta(JsonSchemaArray.class)
596            : session.getClassMeta(JsonSchema.class)
597         );
598         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
599      }
600   }
601
602   /**
603    * Bean property setter:  <property>items</property>.
604    *
605    * @param
606    *    items The new value for the <property>items</property> property on this bean.
607    *    This object must be of type {@link JsonSchema} or {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
608    * @return This object.
609    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
610    */
611   public JsonSchema setItems(Object items) {
612      this.itemsSchema = null;
613      this.itemsSchemaArray = null;
614      if (items != null) {
615         if (items instanceof JsonSchema) {
616            this.itemsSchema = (JsonSchema)items;
617            setMasterOn(this.itemsSchema);
618         } else if (items instanceof JsonSchemaArray) {
619            this.itemsSchemaArray = (JsonSchemaArray)items;
620            setMasterOn(this.itemsSchemaArray);
621         } else {
622            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class, "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  JsonSchema, JsonSchemaArray", className(items));
623         }
624      }
625      return this;
626   }
627
628   /**
629    * Bean property appender:  <property>items</property>.
630    *
631    * @param items The list of items to append to the <property>items</property> property on this bean.
632    * @return This object.
633    */
634   public JsonSchema addItems(JsonSchema...items) {
635      if (this.itemsSchemaArray == null)
636         this.itemsSchemaArray = new JsonSchemaArray();
637      this.itemsSchemaArray.addAll(items);
638      setMasterOn(items);
639      return this;
640   }

647   public Number getMultipleOf() {
648      return multipleOf;
649   }

659      return this;

709   public Number getMinimum() {

713   /**

806   /**
807    * Bean property getter:  <property>additionalItems</property>.
808    *
809    * @return
810    *    The value of the <property>additionalItems</property> property on this bean, or <jk>null</jk> if it is
811    *    not set.
812    *    Can be either a {@link Boolean} or {@link JsonSchemaArray} depending on what value was used to set it.
813    */
814   @Swap(BooleanOrSchemaArraySwap.class)
815   public Object getAdditionalItems() {
816      if (additionalItemsBoolean != null)
817         return additionalItemsBoolean;
818      return additionalItemsSchemaArray;
819   }
820
821   /**
822    * Bean property getter:  <property>additionalItems</property>.
823    *
824    * <p>
825    * Convenience method for returning the <property>additionalItems</property> property when it is a {@link Boolean}
826    * value.
827    *
828    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
829    */
830   public Boolean getAdditionalItemsAsBoolean() {
831      return additionalItemsBoolean;
832   }
833
834   /**
835    * Bean property getter:  <property>additionalItems</property>.
836    *
837    * <p>
838    * Convenience method for returning the <property>additionalItems</property> property when it is a
839    * {@link JsonSchemaArray} value.
840    *
841    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link Boolean}.
842    */
843   public List<JsonSchema> getAdditionalItemsAsSchemaArray() {
844      return additionalItemsSchemaArray;
845   }
846
847   /**
848    * Bean property setter:  <property>additionalItems</property>.
849    *
850    * @param additionalItems
851    *    The new value for the <property>additionalItems</property> property on this bean.
852    *    This object must be of type {@link Boolean} or {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
853    * @return This object.
854    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
855    */
856   public JsonSchema setAdditionalItems(Object additionalItems) {
857      this.additionalItemsBoolean = null;
858      this.additionalItemsSchemaArray = null;
859      if (additionalItems != null) {
860         if (additionalItems instanceof Boolean)
861            this.additionalItemsBoolean = (Boolean)additionalItems;
862         else if (additionalItems instanceof JsonSchemaArray) {
863            this.additionalItemsSchemaArray = (JsonSchemaArray)additionalItems;
864            setMasterOn(this.additionalItemsSchemaArray);
865         } else {
866            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class, "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  Boolean, JsonSchemaArray", className(additionalItems));
867         }
868      }
869      return this;
870   }
871
872   /**
873    * Bean property appender:  <property>additionalItems</property>.
874    *
875    * @param additionalItems
876    *    The list of items to append to the <property>additionalItems</property> property on this bean.
877    * @return This object.
878    */
879   public JsonSchema addAdditionalItems(JsonSchema...additionalItems) {
880      if (this.additionalItemsSchemaArray == null)
881         this.additionalItemsSchemaArray = new JsonSchemaArray();
882      this.additionalItemsSchemaArray.addAll(additionalItems);
883      setMasterOn(additionalItems);
884      return this;
885   }
886
887   /**
888    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>additionalItems</property> property to the correct class type.
889    *
890    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
891    *    <li>
892    *       If parsing a JSON-array, converts to a {@link JsonSchemaArray}.
893    *    <li>
894    *       If parsing a JSON-boolean, converts to a {@link Boolean}.
895    * </ul>
896    *
897    * <p>
898    * Serialization method is a no-op.
899    */
900   public static class BooleanOrSchemaArraySwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
901
902      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
903      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
904         return o;
905      }
906
907      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
908      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
909         ClassMeta<?> cm = (
910            o instanceof Collection
911            ? session.getClassMeta(JsonSchemaArray.class)
912            : session.getClassMeta(Boolean.class)
913         );
914         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
915      }
916   }

1041   /**
1042    * Bean property appender:  <property>required</property>.
1043    *
1044    * @param required The list of items to append to the <property>required</property> property on this bean.
1045    * @return This object.
1046    */
1047   public JsonSchema addRequired(List<String> required) {
1048      if (this.required == null)
1049         this.required = new LinkedList<>();
1050      required.forEach(x -> this.required.add(x));
1051      return this;
1052   }

1054   /**
1055    * Bean property appender:  <property>required</property>.
1056    *
1057    * @param required The list of items to append to the <property>required</property> property on this bean.
1058    * @return This object.
1059    */
1060   public JsonSchema addRequired(String...required) {
1061      if (this.required == null)
1062         this.required = new LinkedList<>();
1063      for (String r : required)
1064         this.required.add(r);
1065      return this;
1066   }

1068   /**
1069    * Bean property appender:  <property>required</property>.
1070    *
1071    * @param properties The list of items to append to the <property>required</property> property on this bean.
1072    * @return This object.
1073    */
1074   public JsonSchema addRequired(JsonSchemaProperty...properties) {
1075      if (this.required == null)
1076         this.required = new LinkedList<>();
1077      for (JsonSchemaProperty p : properties)
1078         this.required.add(p.getName());
1079      return this;
1080   }

1111    * Bean property getter:  <property>additionalProperties</property>.
1112    *
1113    * <p>
1114    * Convenience method for returning the <property>additionalProperties</property> property when it is a
1115    * {@link JsonSchema} value.
1116    *
1117    * @return The currently set value, or <jk>null</jk> if the property is not set, or is set as a {@link Boolean}.

1120      return additionalPropertiesSchema;
1121   }

1123   /**
1124    * Bean property setter:  <property>additionalProperties</property>.
1125    *
1126    * @param additionalProperties
1127    *    The new value for the <property>additionalProperties</property> property on this bean.
1128    *    This object must be of type {@link Boolean} or {@link JsonSchema}.
1129    * @return This object.
1130    * @throws BeanRuntimeException If invalid object type passed in.
1131    */
1132   @Beanp(dictionary={JsonSchema.class})
1133   public JsonSchema setAdditionalProperties(Object additionalProperties) {
1134      this.additionalPropertiesBoolean = null;
1135      this.additionalPropertiesSchema = null;
1136      if (additionalProperties != null) {
1137         if (additionalProperties instanceof Boolean)
1138            this.additionalPropertiesBoolean = (Boolean)additionalProperties;
1139         else if (additionalProperties instanceof JsonSchema) {
1140            this.additionalPropertiesSchema = (JsonSchema)additionalProperties;
1141            setMasterOn(this.additionalPropertiesSchema);
1142         } else
1143            throw new BeanRuntimeException(JsonSchemaProperty.class,
1144               "Invalid attribute type ''{0}'' passed in.  Must be one of the following:  Boolean, JsonSchema",
1145               className(additionalProperties));
1146      }
1147      return this;
1148   }

1150   /**
1151    * Used during parsing to convert the <property>additionalProperties</property> property to the correct class type.
1152    *
1153    * <ul class='spaced-list'>
1154    *    <li>
1155    *       If parsing a JSON-object, converts to a {@link JsonSchema}.
1156    *    <li>
1157    *       If parsing a JSON-boolean, converts to a {@link Boolean}.
1158    * </ul>
1159    *
1160    * <p>
1161    * Serialization method is a no-op.
1162    */
1163   public static class BooleanOrSchemaSwap extends ObjectSwap<Object,Object> {
1164
1165      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
1166      public Object swap(BeanSession session, Object o) throws SerializeException {
1167         return o;
1168      }
1169
1170      @Override /* ObjectSwap */
1171      public Object unswap(BeanSession session, Object o, ClassMeta<?> hint) throws ParseException {
1172         ClassMeta<?> cm = (
1173            o instanceof Boolean
1174            ? session.getClassMeta(Boolean.class)
1175            : session.getClassMeta(JsonSchema.class)
1176         );
1177         return session.convertToType(o, cm);
1178      }
1179   }

1212      return this;

1234   }

1243      setMasterOn(allOf);
1244      this.allOf = addAll(this.allOf, allOf);
1245      return this;

1348      return ref;

1351   /**
1352    * Bean property setter:  <property>$ref</property>.
1353    *
1354    * <p>
1355    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
1356    * Strings must be valid URIs.
1357    *
1358    * <p>
1359    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
1360    *
1361    * @param ref The new value for the <property>$ref</property> property on this bean.
1362    * @return This object.
1363    */
1364   @Beanp("$ref")
1365   public JsonSchema setRef(Object ref) {
1366      this.ref = toURI(ref);
1367      return this;
1368   }
1369
1370   private void setMasterOn(JsonSchema s) {
1371      if (s != null)
1372         s.setMaster(this);
1373   }
1374
1375   private void setMasterOn(JsonSchema[] ss) {
1376      if (ss != null)
1377         for (JsonSchema s : ss)
1378            setMasterOn(s);
1379   }
1380
1381   private void setMasterOn(Collection<JsonSchema> ss) {
1382      if (ss != null)
1383         ss.forEach(x -> setMasterOn(x));
1384   }
1385
1386   private void setMasterOn(JsonSchemaArray ss) {
1387      if (ss != null)
1388         ss.forEach(x -> setMasterOn(x));
1389   }
1390
1391   /**
1392    * Sets the master schema for this schema and all child schema objects.
1393    *
1394    * <p>
1395    * All child elements in a schema should point to a single "master" schema in order to locate registered JsonSchemaMap
1396    * objects for resolving external schemas.
1397    *
1398    * @param master The master schema to associate on this and all children.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
1399    */
1400   protected void setMaster(JsonSchema master) {
1401      this.master = master;
1402      if (definitions != null)
1403         definitions.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1404      if (properties != null)
1405         properties.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1406      if (patternProperties != null)
1407         patternProperties.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1408      if (dependencies != null)
1409         dependencies.values().forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1410      if (itemsSchema != null)
1411         itemsSchema.setMaster(master);
1412      if (itemsSchemaArray != null)
1413         itemsSchemaArray.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1414      if (additionalItemsSchemaArray != null)
1415         additionalItemsSchemaArray.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1416      if (additionalPropertiesSchema != null)
1417         additionalPropertiesSchema.setMaster(master);
1418      if (allOf != null)
1419         allOf.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1420      if (anyOf != null)
1421         anyOf.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1422      if (oneOf != null)
1423         oneOf.forEach(x -> x.setMaster(master));
1424      if (not != null)
1425         not.setMaster(master);
1426   }
1427
1428   /**
1429    * Resolve schema if reference.
1430    *
1431    * <p>
1432    * If this schema is a reference to another schema (has its <property>$ref</property> property set), this
1433    * method will retrieve the referenced schema from the schema map registered with this schema.
1434    *
1435    * <p>
1436    * If this schema is not a reference, or no schema map is registered with this schema, this method is a no-op and
1437    * simply returns this object.
1438    *
1439    * @return The referenced schema, or <jk>null</jk>.
1440    */
1441   public JsonSchema resolve() {
1442      if (ref == null || master.schemaMap == null)
1443         return this;
1444      return master.schemaMap.get(ref);
1445   }
1446
1447   /**
1448    * Associates a schema map with this schema for resolving other schemas identified through <property>$ref</property>
1449    * properties.
1450    *
1451    * @param schemaMap The schema map to associate with this schema.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
1452    * @return This object.
1453    */
1454   public JsonSchema setSchemaMap(JsonSchemaMap schemaMap) {
1455      this.schemaMap = schemaMap;
1456      return this;
1457   }
1458
1459   @Override /* Object */
1460   public String toString() {
1461      return JsonSerializer.DEFAULT.toString(this);
1462   }
1463}
